reviews.text: Excellent, station. A really helpful man in the ticket office, nothing to much trouble, giving choice of the best fares. Well done 👍
Just a quiet and small station in the town. Lucky enough to have a half hourly service, seating, shelter and step free access so I can't moan too much.

Clean, sheltered seating.  Bike rack. Trains every 15 mins to Cardiff central.  No toilets. Part time manned ticket booth. Limited parking that is free. Departure boards.  Wheelchair accessible.  Very close to town. Taxi place and newsagent etc yards away. If you are going to penarth do so by train as there is a severe shortage of parking.
Staff helped me save 10 pounds on journey to London without me even asking!  Thanks

The station staff are always helpful when buying tickets not just to Cardiff but all UK destinations and always try to get the cheapest price tickets. Just a pity it seems to be only staffed in the mornings.
